name: Mythoria
description: MYR is AIFortuna's second ecosystem token for its AI-driven PVP game (Mythoria), built using its proprietary AITee technology. MYR aims to incentivize players and drive a deflationary value cycle, integrating a buyback and burn mechanism and seamlessly merging with FUSD. Within the game's economy, MYR transforms player participation into lasting value, ensuring that every player action not only brings entertainment but also contributes to the growth of the AIFortuna ecosystem.
